name: streemian-app-account
description: Unlock your Steem account for streemian.com

scripts.postbuild: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp lib/app.* dist/ && cp src/app.css dist/ && cp src/*.svg dist/
scripts.preparearchive: cp -rf dist releases/app-account-$npm_package_version && cd releases && zip -r app-account-$npm_package_version.zip app-account-$npm_package_version
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && cp -vfR releases/app-account-$npm_package_version/* . && git commit -am "[deploy] $npm_package_version" && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.release: npm run tag && npm run preparearchive && npm run checksums
